DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine whether HepavaxGene TF non-inferior comparator vaccine impede hepatitis B transmission mother positive chronic hepatitis B ( Stratum 1 ) child also term seroconversion rate child mother negative chronic hepatitis B ( Stratum 2 ) one month completion immunization schedule .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Hepatitis B Vaccine Hepavax-Gene TF Comparator Hepatitis B Vaccine Newborns
DOC.criteria: Three type subject : Neonates whose mother positive HBsAg HBeAg Neonates whose mother positive HBsAg Neonates whose mother negative HBsAg HBeAg INCLUSION CRITERIA : Fullterm neonates gestational age 37 week 42 week ; Apgar score less 7 birth ; Neonates standard body temperature ( auxiliary temperature < 37.1° ) ; Neonates weigh ≥ 2,500 gram birth ; Neonates icteric index within normal range ( physiologic jaundice permit ) ; Informed consent form sign parent/guardian ; The requirement clinical trial protocol observe basis opinion investigator . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Subject 's parent history family diseases convulsion brain disease ; Mothers low immunologic function history organ transplantation hemodialysis ; Subject 's parent allergic composition Hepatitis B vaccine ; A family history thrombocytopenia , disturbance blood coagulation , may result contraindication intramuscular injection ; Known immunologic function damage ; Mothers receive gamma globulin immunoglobulin injection pregnancy ; Any congenital malformation Known suspect suffer disease active infection cardiovascular disease ; Any condition believe investigator possible impact trial evaluation .
